item.title: Candor and Kubernetes: How The New York Times Built a $2 Billion Digital Powerhouse
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The New York Times transformed into a $2 billion digital revenue powerhouse by embracing radical candor, re-engineering its technical stack with Kubernetes, and evolving its monetization strategy from simple paywalls to sophisticated behavioral funnels, offering a blueprint for legacy enterprises.

item.title: The Evolution of Python Environment Management
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: A practitioner’s walkthrough of why Python suffers from dependency hell, how tools like virtualenv, pyenv, Poetry, and UV emerged to solve it, and what this evolution tells us about modern software ecosystems.

item.title: The NPM Supply Chain Attack: A Wake-Up Call for Digital Infrastructure
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: An analysis of the recent NPM supply chain attack, its implications for global digital infrastructure, and the urgent need for enhanced security in open-source ecosystems.
